titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: ESTIMATED DATE OF DELIVERY - Description

body.p: The date on which a pregnant PERSON is expected to give birth.
This will be calculated as follows:

div.p: from the LAST MENSTRUAL PERIOD DATE if the Dating Ultrasound Scan agrees within 7 days or,
if the difference is more than 7 days, the date calculated from the Dating Ultrasound Scan will be taken.
If neither of these are available, a clinical assessment is used.

body.p: The method of calculation for the date is as identified by the METHOD OF ESTIMATED DATE OF DELIVERY .
